channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
item.description:
Nov 14, 11:14 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 14, 10:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 8, 01:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/11/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 14/11/2023 10:59 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in RBX3 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.

item.title: VPS - BHS6 - host356233
item.description:
Nov 13, 16:00 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 13, 15:44 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 4 hour(s)

Affected switches

bhs7-pciz3host1-a70

Affected racks

B704A02

Affected hosts

host356233
